title: cifti-create-parcellated-from-template
description:
Match parcels to template by name.

For each parcel name in the template mapping, find that name in an input cifti file and use its data in the output file.  All input cifti files must have a parcels mapping along <modify-direction> and matching mappings along other dimensions.  The direction can be either an integer starting from 1, or the strings 'ROW' or 'COLUMN'.

cifti_template.title: cifti_template
cifti_template.description: a cifti file with the template parcel mapping along column

modify_direction.title: modify_direction
modify_direction.description: which dimension of the output file should match the template (integer, 'ROW', or 'COLUMN')

opt_fill_value_value.title: opt_fill_value_value
opt_fill_value_value.description: specify value to be used in parcels that don't match: value to use (default 0)
